title: Pink drinks to match today's vibe
p: From teas to mocktails to lemonades... I'm sure you'll find something that suits your taste !

recipes.name: Blushing Lemonade
recipes.method: Freshly squeezed lemonade, Strawberry juice, and Sparkling water come together in perfect harmony, topped with a splash of agave. Served in a clear cup with a sugar rim and garnished with edible flowers.

recipes.name: XOXO Fizz
recipes.method: Indulge in the sweetness of watermelon juice, perfectly balanced with a splash of sprite. Topped with a fluffy cloud of cotton candy, creating a memorizing glitter effect when you push it in. Served in an elegant flute cup.

recipes.name: Sweet Strawberry Tea
recipes.method: Lightly mash 1 cup of fresh strawberries to release their juices and put them in a teapot. Add 1 tbsp of dried hibiscus and 1 tbsp of dried spearmint. Pour hot water over the mixture, then cover and steep for 10 minutes. Finally, strain, sweeten with honey, and serve warm or over ice.

recipes.name: Raspberry Mojito
recipes.method: Mix lime juice, sparkling water, raspberries, and mint leaves in a glass, then add ice.

recipes.name: Blood Orange & Rosewater
recipes.method: Mix rosewater, blood orange juice, lemon juice, and sparkling water in a glass. Then add ice and throw-in a raspberry.
